text: The 1947 Arizona State Sun Devils football team was an American football team that represented Arizona State College (later renamed Arizona State University) in the Border Conference during the 1947 college football season. In its first season under head coach Ed Doherty, the team compiled a 4–7 record (3–4 against Border opponents) and outscored opponents by a total of 234 to 168. ==Schedule== ==References== Arizona State Category:Arizona State Sun Devils football seasons Category:1947 in Arizona
title: 1947 Arizona State Sun Devils football team
